```{python}
import numpy as np
import scipy as sc
import matplotlib as mpl

modules = [np, sc, mpl]
row = "<tr> <td>%s</td> <td>%s</td> </tr>"
rows = "\n".join([
    row % (module.__name__, module.__version__) for module in modules
])
s = "<table> <tr><th>Library</th><th>Version</th> </tr> %s</table>" % rows
```

```{python}
s
```

```{python}
HTML(s)
```

```{python}
class HTMLDisplayer:
    def __init__(self, code):
        self.code = code

    def _repr_html_(self):
        return self.code
```

```{python}
HTMLDisplayer(s)
```
